text: Tunak Tunak Tun is an Indian pop song released in 1998. It has become an internet meme.The Indian Times, 2008. It was made because most of Daler Mehndi's other videos have women dancing. Some people said that was the only reason his music was popular. This one has just him but became a success anyway. It has used bluescreen technology."Chroma Keys are a technology that allows composting images or frames together." English Wikipedia, 2010. ==References== Category:1998 songs
title: Tunak Tunak Tun
